subSections.text:

subSections.title: Synonyms
subSections.text:
* {{l|ko|鍤}} ([[가래]] 삽): [[spade]], [[shovel]]
* {{l|ko|鍬}} ([[가래]] 초): [[spade]], [[shovel]], [[ploughshare]]
* {{l|ko|鏵}} ([[가래]] 화): [[spade]], [[shovel]], [[ploughshare]]
* {{l|ko|鋘}} ([[가래]] 화): [[spade]], [[shovel]], [[ploughshare]]

subSections.title: See also
subSections.text:
* {{l|ko|鋤}} ([[호미]] 서): hoe (short-handled, single-handed)
* {{l|ko|鉏}} ([[호미]] 서): hoe (short-handled, single-handed)
* {{l|ko|錤}} ([[호미]] 기): hoe (short-handled, single-handed)
* {{l|ko|鎡}} ([[호미]] 자): hoe (short-handled, single-handed)
* {{l|ko|鎒}} ([[호미]] 호): hoe (short-handled, single-handed)
* {{l|ko|钁}} ([[괭이]] 곽): [[hoe]] (long-handled, two-handed)
* {{l|ko|钃}} ([[괭이]]/[[호미]] 촉): [[hoe]] (long- or short-handled)
